name: iPython Notebook Goodies
tagline: Random goodies for use in iPython Notebooks
body:
ipython_notebook_goodies ======================== Random goodies for use in iPython Notebooks 1. Table of Contents -------------------- Make a table of contents for your notebook. Uses headings (e.g. H1, H2, etc.) to build TOC, and provides anchors (added where needed). **Usage:** Include the following at the top of your notebook:

Table of Contents
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
